description: Garlic is rich in nutrients like selenium, quercetin and vitamin C, all of which help treat eye infections and swelling.
Garlic is commonly used for curing earaches, as it has several antiviral, antifungal, and antibiotic properties.
Garlic clears up most intestinal problems like dysentery, diarrhea, and colitis. Its role in dispelling worms is phenomenal.
Raw garlic is used to treat colds and coughs.
